data.name: The Wandering Village Demo
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist the game

If you enjoy the game, please leave us a wishlist!


About the Game

Welcome to the demo version of our new game 'The Wandering Village', a city-building game on the back of a giant, wandering creature.
Please note that this demo is available in English only, but the game will be localised to many more languages in the course of its development.

In this demo you become the leader of a group of people that are desperately searching for a new home. Their village has been taken over by the spreading plague of toxic plants that is spreading across the land.
It feels like a miracle when they encounter an Onbu, a giant creature made of earth that was believed to have been extinct centuries ago. Together you set out on a long journey, hoping to find a place where you can both live in peace.

This demo ends after a few hours of playtime after you encounter the first Giant Pollen Event.
We hope you enjoy it and look forward to your feedback :)

data.short_description: Establish a new village on the back of the giant, wandering creature Onbu and try to survive together in a world full of spreading poison. That this demo is available in English only, but will be localised to many more languages in the course of its development.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with Shader Model 5.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
